short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: H264ify with Auto 1080 Chrome Extension saves you from buffering videos & lets you set default video quality on YouTube & more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
H264ify with Auto 1080p is a Chrome extension that automatically sets video playback to 1080p by default on YouTube, Prime Video, and Disney+ Hot star. Enhance your streaming experience with consistent video quality. 


Features: 

Automatic 1080p: Sets video quality to 1080p by default on supported sites. 

Codec Conversion: Converts YouTube’s VP9 codec to H264 for improved compatibility. 

Battery Efficiency: Utilizes the H264 codec, which may reduce CPU load and extend battery life. 

Smooth Streaming: Aims to improve video playback even with slower internet connections. 


How to Use: 

Install: Go to the Chrome Web Store, search for H264ify with Auto 1080p, and click Add to Chrome. 

Activate: Ensure the extension is active by clicking the icon in the browser toolbar. 

Set Video Quality: Visit supported sites to automatically set video quality to 1080p. 

Adjust Screen Settings: Use the extension to adjust screen brightness with a single click. 

Codec Switching: Use the extension options to switch YouTube’s VP9 codec to H264. 


Advantages: 

Automatic Quality Adjustment: Sets video quality to 1080p on supported sites. 

Codec Compatibility: Switches YouTube’s VP9 codec to H264. 

Battery Optimization: May reduce CPU load, potentially extending battery life. 

Improved Playback: Aims to enhance video playback stability. 


Who It Benefits: 

Users of YouTube, Prime Video, and Disney+ Hotstar who prefer to have their video quality set to 1080p automatically. 


Why It Is Useful: 

For users who want to automatically maintain 1080p video quality on supported sites without manual adjustments.
